text: I recently went through a tough time where my personal information was exposed online. I felt so violated and didn't know where to turn. The steps I've taken to reclaim my privacy include changing all my passwords, setting up two-factor authentication, and being more cautious about what I share on social media. It's been a difficult journey, but with the support of this community, I'm learning to cope and protect myself better. Welcome to the new member of our group, and I hope you find the support you need here as well.
